mapper.sql: id, create_date, update_date, data_status, desp, serve_grade, loading_grade, goods_grade, content, shipper_id, transporter_id, waybill_id, shipper_company_id, transporter_company_id, attachment_id_1, attachment_id_2, attachment_id_3, attachment_id_4, anonymity, order_id, order_no
mapper.select:
select a.id, a.create_date as createDate, a.update_date as updateDate, a.serve_grade as serveGrade, a.loading_grade as loadGrade, a.goods_grade goodsGrade,a.content, a.anonymity,a.order_no as orderNo, b.mobile as transporterMobile,b.surname,b.name, c.mobile as shipperMobile, e.name as shipperCompanyName from t_transporter_comment a left join t_user b on a.transporter_id = b.id left join t_user c on a.shipper_id = c.id left join t_company e on a.shipper_company_id = e.id
and a.order_no like concat('%',#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and b.mobile like concat('%',#{transporterMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and c.mobile like concat('%',#{shipperMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and e.name like concat('%',#{shipperCompanyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
